Control Name: Obtains Confidentiality Commitments from Vendors and Business Partners—The entity obtains confidentiality commitments that are consistent with the entity’s confidentiality commitments and requirements from vendors and business partners who have access to confidential information.

control_attributes.Control: Obtains Confidentiality Commitments from Vendors and Business Partners—The entity obtains confidentiality commitments that are consistent with the entity’s confidentiality commitments and requirements from vendors and business partners who have access to confidential information.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
